### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #15729 (rpc: Raise error in getbalance if minconf is not zero by promag)

If you consider this pull request important, p

> ACK, LGTM.
> I think it would make sense to squash the two commits into one.

Sure. I felt they are 2 separate ideas, thus they are separate. Got your point though. Should I close this issue and resubmit with the squashed commits?
> Should I close this issue and resubmit with the squashed commits?\n\nThere's no need to open a new PR just to squash commits, you can do that in this  PR.
